message: Hi Bob, I have a product I think you'll be interested in.  I'm offering it to you for $150.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $120 is my absolute minimum, I'm willing to come down a bit to $135.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $135, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $125.
